Rainy_Day_0: It's raining.. The plants should be thriving, tomorrow will be a great day to collect some ingredients.
Rainy_Day_1: I was going to water some plants for you today, but I guess the rain took care of it.
Rainy_Day_2: I might take a day off today and just mull around the house.
Rainy_Day_3: Look at that rain! At least you don't have to water your crops today.
Rainy_Day_4: Hey, another rainy day... perfect.#$e#You look cold... here, come closer.$l
Rainy_Night_0: I'm trying my best to quit smoking now that we're married... I don't wanna die on you. It's a bad habit.#$e#I want to have a future together.$l
patio_Witch: I'm just working on some spells, don't mind me.
Rainy_Night_1: Ok potions replenished, ingredients stocked..$u#$b#Oh sorry dear, I didn't see you there.$h#$b#How was your day?
Rainy_Night_2: Welcome home dear! I made you some dinner.[921]$h
Rainy_Night_3: Hello dear, did you go down the mines today?$h#$e#You look tired, why don't we go to bed?
Rainy_Night_4: Remember when you used to go to sleep not knowing if I'd curse you or not?#$b#I hope you didn't find me too repulsive.$s
Indoor_Day_0: I was just fulfilling an order earlier and I made some extra, here.[341]
Indoor_Day_1: Hey... want some coffee?[395]$7#$e#I need some, I have a big order to fulfil today.
Indoor_Day_2: How are the crops this year? Let me know if you'd like me to cast a spell to get some giant crops!
Indoor_Day_3: We should expand the house, maybe add a henchman or two.
Indoor_Day_4: Are you going to the mines today? Here this might help.[341]
Indoor_Night_0: I spent all day cleaning today, I hope you like the place.
Indoor_Night_2: Do you ever think about your mortality? It must be scary knowing you can only live for up to 100 years.
Indoor_Night_3: It's kind of lonely out here, maybe you should activate my monster shrine so we can have some running around the farm.
Indoor_Night_4: You know, it's nice being away from that swamp.
Outdoor_0: We should get some slimes on the farm! No need for the hatch, just let them run wild.
Outdoor_1: It's so weird being outdoors, I feel like I'm so used to endlessly staying in my hut.
Outdoor_2: I love seeing all the plants you grow, you work so hard.$h
Outdoor_3: I'm just taking in some fresh air, I hope I'm not in your way.
Outdoor_4: What do you think of my crystals? I used to think they were gimicky but I've found them to be really useful.$u
OneKid_0: Should I teach %kid1 some spells when they get older?
OneKid_1: %kid1 is such a handful! Imagine having more children!
OneKid_3: %kid1 has the makings of a real wizard one day! Maybe he'll join my coven in college? ^ %kid1 has the makings of a real witch one day! Maybe she'll join my coven in college?
TwoKids_0: It's hard to look after %kid1 and %kid2, sorry if the house isn't as clean as it normally is..
TwoKids_1: Parenthood is so chaotic! Yesterday %kid2 threw up all over the kitchen floor.
TwoKids_2: Do you think you'll take %kid1 and %kid2 down the mines with you one day when they're older?$u
TwoKids_3: Promise me you won't use my shrine on the children?
Good_0: When you broke into my hut that day, could you ever have imagined we'd be here?
Good_1: Hey... come here. You look great today.$h
Good_2: You smell great, you remind me of some of my favourite potions. $h
Good_3: I'm so happy we got here together! I can't imagine my life without you. $h
Good_4: You work so hard! I'm lucky to have someone who takes care of me so well!
Good_5: When we met I was so angry all the time, I'm lucky you helped me through my dark patch.
Good_6: Are you monster hunting today? Here this might help.[879]
Good_8: Every day feels wonderful when I'm with you. $h
Good_9: Have I thanked you recently for your help lifting my curse? I feel so much better now because of you. $h
Neutral_0: I might go for a walk today, I need to clear my head.
Neutral_2: I'm a bit busy right now, let's catch up later.
Neutral_3: I wish I had some more friends in the valley..$s
Neutral_4: There are too many chores, I know you do a lot on the farm, but could you wash your dishes before you leave?
Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money? I could sell more potions I guess..$s
Neutral_6: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I like being alone, anyways.
Neutral_8: I don't feel like doing anything today.
Bad_5: Look, I just want to be alone. Why did you marry me only to neglect me after? $a
Bad_6: Maybe it wasn't so bad being cursed and alone.$s
Bad_7: This place is starting to feel like a tomb.$s
Bad_8: It's miserable here. Something needs to change.$s
spring_1: Happy new year! No matter how long I live, I always love reflecting today and thinking of the year ahead. $h
spring_12: I hear the townsfolks are looking for eggs tomorrow? Such a strange custom.. $u
spring_23: Are you going to the flower dance? It reminds me of my college coven.
summer_1: It's summer again.. At least I'm out of the swamp, but it's still too warm.
summer_10: Are you making that soup tomorrow? You should add something magical. $h
summer_27: The moonlight jellies are back tomorrow. Rasmodius & I used to go.#$e#Maybe one year I'll be brave enough to go  and we can start a new tradition.
fall_1: Spooky season! It's my favourite time of year!
fall_15: Do you know my friend Welwick? She does the fortunes on TV. She'll be at the fair tomorrow, will you say hello? $u
fall_26: I'm excited for the Spirit's Eve tomorrow. I'm meeting my coven so I'll be back late!$h
fall_28: It's my birthday today.$h#$b#I don't remember how old I am, I stopped counting after 200.
winter_1: It's nice and cold! Are you looking forward to a break from farming?
winter_28: It's been a great year, @. We should celebrate a little. [346]$h#$e#I'm sure next year will be even better.$7
